body_html: Ah, I thought we're sending the tensor to GPU0 for some reason, but I think that if it's only a matter of initializing the device then it's ok. If you don't want to use GPU0 at all please set CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES env var before starting the interpreter.
body_text: Ah, I thought we're sending the tensor to GPU0 for some reason, but I think that if it's only a matter of initializing the device then it's ok. If you don't want to use GPU0 at all please set CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES env var before starting the interpreter.
body: Ah, I thought we're sending the tensor to GPU0 for some reason, but I think that if it's only a matter of initializing the device then it's ok. If you don't want to use GPU0 at all please set `CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES` env var before starting the interpreter.
